adjectives.description: sexist (comparative more sexist, superlative most sexist)

entries.meaning: Unfairly discriminatory against one sex in favour of the other.
examples: What was all that about?Well, like all women, she's shoe-mad.'t's a bit sexist, isn't it?Do you know one woman who isn't obsessed with shoes?No, but I only know one woman. And she just left the room shouting "THE SHOES!"

entries.meaning: A person who discriminates on grounds of sex; someone who practises sexism.
